snippet.title: Roof Rage Arcade Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
The Arcade update adds an unlockable boss, by successfully winning the arcade mode on normal or hard difficulty without a loss.
This update also include achievements, new portraits, and gameplay balance.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/724300/Roof_Rage/
